name: Curious Alice
description: Curious Alice is a virtual reality experience that transports you to a world created by master illustrator Kristjana S. Williams and immersive games studio PRELOADED. Follow the guidance of your own personal White Rabbit companion, all the while attempting to find missing objects, solve the Caterpillar's mind-bending riddles, visit the Queen of Hearts’ croquet garden, while experiencing more classic moments from this legendary tale.
